capabilities.name: pensar_run_scan
capabilities.description:
Use this tool to scan for vulnerabilities in a block of code or suggested code change. This tool ONLY responds with an array of vulnerabilities found in the json format { message: string, startLineNumber: number, endLineNumber: number, CWE: string[], severity: "critical" | "high" | "medium" | "low" }.

This tool takes as input: `codeSnippet` the generate code snippet to scan, and `fileExtension` the file extension of the target source code file (e.g. .py, .ts, .go).

After calling this tool, you must edit the generated code snippet to remove the vulnerabilities found while maintaining core functionality of the code.
